column1: Image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of the MRI, showing the head of a man of 37 years old of sagittal section. Slice n°143 is observed starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the brainstem of volume 188.5254 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5091.5039 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4467.9199 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 275.5371 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 614.3555 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1633.4473 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 448.2422 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 333.5449 mm³, the right putamen of volume 59.3262 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 67.2363 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 51.4160 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 50.0977 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 145.0195 mm³.
